name: megastack
description: The ultimate stack for true web outlaws.

scripts.build: tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && cp -R template lib/template && rimraf --glob 'lib/bin/**/*.d.ts' lib/template/node_modules lib/template/build lib/template/package-lock.json && cp package.json README.md LICENSE.txt lib/ && cd lib && npm pkg delete scripts devDependencies
scripts.postinstall: cd template && npm ci && ln -nsf ../../lib node_modules/megastack && rimraf node_modules/react-corsair node_modules/react-executor node_modules/react node_modules/react-dom && npm run build-translations

author: Savva Mikhalevski <smikhalevski@gmail.com>
